mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REVIEW (RV_NO, M_NO, P_NO, RV_DELETE, RV_STAR, RV_IMG, RV_POSTDATE, RV_MODIFYDATE, RV_CONTENT) VALUES (REVIEW_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{param1}, #{param2}, 0, #{param3}, #{param4}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, #{param5})
mapper.select: SELECT B.* FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RN, A.* FROM (SELECT RV.*, M.M_NICK, M.M_ID FROM REVIEW RV LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON RV.M_NO = M.M_NO AND RV.RV_DELETE = 0 WHERE P_NO = #{param1} ORDER BY RV.RV_POSTDATE DESC ) A ) B WHERE RN BETWEEN #{param2} AND #{param3}
